column2: Thursday Kos: Is Biden a Progressive President?
column5: It’s been 100 days of President Biden and it’s been...quiet--but still productive for progressives says Markos  Markos and Rev. Mark dissect the Biden administration’s strategies and nominations and put them against the backdrop of American history to see where we’re actually advancing. Markos also shares his thoughts on Derek Chauvin being found guilty of the murder of George Floyd and on the latest George Floyd-style police killing of Mario Gonzalez in Alameda. CA.
